name: Costs for repair and renovation of science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field, research animal space, and time of repair and renovation: FYs 2006–23
description: Costs for repair and renovation of science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field, research animal space, and time of repair and renovation: FYs 2006–23

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_field_and_research_animal_space_b
variableMeasured.description: Field and research animal space hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_planned_to_start_in_fy_2022_or_fy_2023
variableMeasured.description: Planned To Start In Fy 2022 Or Fy 2023

variableMeasured.name: field_deferred_projects_included_in_institutional_plan
variableMeasured.description: Deferred Projects Included In Institutional Plan

variableMeasured.name: field_deferred_projects_not_included_in_institutional_plan
variableMeasured.description: Deferred Projects Not Included In Institutional Plan

notes: In FY 2015, "Agricultural sciences and natural resources sciences" was split into "Agricultural sciences" and "Natural resources and conservation." Prior to FY 2015, data for "Natural resources and conservation" are included in "Agricultural sciences." For details on field changes in FY 2021, see "Changes in the questionnaire" in the "Technical Notes" section. Data were not collected on repair or renovation of research animal space in FYs 2010–21. Deferred projects are those that (1) are not funded and (2) are not scheduled for FY 2022 or FY 2023. Data in this table, which utilizes repair and renovation project costs, may not match data in table 27, which relies on source of funds, a separate set of survey variables. Details may not add to totals due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities.
